author: Kelly McLaughlin
title: Dr. Fauci dunked on Trump's intent to open the country by Easter, saying we can't 'arbitrarily' bring things back to normal
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, spoke to Trevor Noah on a social distancing episode of the "The Daily Show" on Thursday. While he didn't mention Trump directly, he did criticize his intention to op…
content: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, seemingly criticized President Donald Trump's intent to relax restrictions on the United States economy by Easter, saying the nation can't "arbitrarily" pick a date … [+1456 chars]
